1:
RESTRICTED 
NO.CAS-8(1)/2004-Div.I 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
‘A’ WING , JANPATH BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
 
Date: 24-9-2008 
 
 
CIRCULAR No. 10/2008 
 
SUBJECT:- ACCESS OF VEHICLES UPTO THE AIRCRAFT AT CIVIL 
AIRPORTS 
IN 
THE 
COUNTRY 
ON 
SECURITY  
GROUNDS. 
 
 
Reference BCAS Circular No. 36/2005 dated 30/8/2005 on the 
subject cited  above. 
  
Shri N. Janardhana Reddy Hon’ble Member of Parliament is 
permitted  to take his vehicle (without escort)  up to  the tarmac during  his 
departure/arrival by air from/to airports in Andhra Pradesh; and also at 
Delhi, Chennai and Nagpur airports on the grounds of security till further 
review.  
 
 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
